author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Euro Falls Against Dollar Following ECB Monetary Policy Meeting
text:
The euro dropped against the dollar Thursday, as some investors locked in profits on the currency after the European Central Bank held its monetary policy meeting.
The euro was recently down 0.8% to $1.2313.
In a statement issued Thursday, the ECB dropped a long-held pledge to accelerate its â‚¬30 billion ($37 billion) monthly bond-buying...
